column3: The knife of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin.
A sword that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies.
A spear that symbolizes Dvalin's fire resolve.
A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.
A jade spear capable of slaying ancient beasts.
A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius.
A longsword used by the Wolf Knight.
This edgeless sword seems to possess divine might.
A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius.
A standard knife used by the Knights of Favonius.
The soul of the Knights of Favonius.
A ceremonial knife masterfully carved from pure jade.
